item.description: import init, { compile } from '/rulex_play.js' async function initialize() { await init() window.compileRulex = (input, options) = { const [success, output, help, s_prefix, s_content, s_suffix] = compile( input, options?.flavor ?? 'js' ) if (success) { return output } else { return { error: output, help, spans: [s_prefix, s_content, s_suffix], } } } window.dispatchEvent(new Event('rulex-initialized')) } initialize() const rulexCode = document.getElementById('rulex-input') const echo = document.
